text: @senatemajldr @AmyMcGrathKY @courierjournal add this bill to the pile.  50,000 COVID-19 cases today. Biggest day since this nightmare started. BREONNA TAYLOR MURDERED 110 days ago. No stimulus for states under attack. And NOW This bastard is going on vacation? WTF DOES HE DO? @heraldleader https://t.co/FqCXIvHFFX
